Performer:
Takemoto Datetayū V (see also Takemoto Datejidayū) (竹本伊達大夫 (五))

Alternate Name: Takemoto Datejidayū (竹本伊達路大夫)

Dates: '1988/04-'

Specialty: Tayu

Notes: Bunraku meikan (1980, 1985, 1988, 1990, 1994)


Performances as Narrator:
